# scam.video — Video & Content Scam Database

> Community-powered database of video & content scams. Search, vote, report, and protect yourself. Exposing fraud in the video & content industry.


scam.video is a community-driven scam exposure platform focused on the video & content industry. Features a searchable database of known scams with risk levels, community voting, reporting tools, and educational resources. Users can search scams, vote on severity, share warnings on social media, and report new scams.


## Pages

- [Homepage — Video & Content scam database and community reports](https://scam.video)


## Keywords

video & content scams, scam database, fraud alert, scam warning, scam.video
